message: I'm offering you a favorable 45% split, Bob. Given your higher inflation penalty of 20% per round, accepting now would be more beneficial than waiting.
Considering my higher inflation rate, I'm willing to take a larger share. Accepting now will save us both from further losses.
Bob, consider that your share is already worth 40% less due to inflation. If you reject this offer, you'll lose another 20% in the next round. This is your best chance to secure a meaningful amount.
